name: Cosmic Rocket Agency Flight
description:
Become a part of space program trying to control heavy spaceship exploring the outer space! This galaxy (and not only this) is waiting for you to show its wonderful stars, amazing planets and shiny constellations! Try our new Cosmic Rocket Agency Flight simulator game and you absolutely won’t be disappointed!

Start amazing interstellar trip and gain spaceship flight experience and finally dock to the ISS to prove your worth as an astronaut! Space with its innumerable galaxies is waiting for you, captain! Rush into this fantastically realistic space shuttling game and become the best spacecraft pilot ever!

Be ready for a space adventure full of dangers! Travel the solar system flying past Earth and other planets trying to complete different missions! Get your skills to a new level and gain absolutely ultimate spaceship fight experience! Bring satellites into the orbit, scan structure of realistic spacecraft, space shuttles and even an ISS with its engines and moving parts playing Cosmic Rocket Agency Flight game!

Control your spacecraft just tapping and tilting a device and explore the detailed solar system with all sorts of spaceships. Try different ones, upgrade it with modern technologies and choose your favorite one. Earn points and make your first space adventure absolutely unbelievable!

Cosmic Rocket Agency Flight features:
• Very realistic simulation of spaceship piloting
• Outstanding galaxy surroundings
• Interesting ways to power your super rocket up
• Chance to control amazing spacecraft by yourself

Explore solar system, pilot a spaceship, watch planets and asteroids and do everything possible to avoid space crashes! Try yourself as an astronaut piloting space shuttle with this amazing flight simulator! Ever dreamed to become an astronaut? Then check Cosmic Rocket Agency Flight game!
